mapper.select: SELECT iu.item_code as itemCode ,iu.shop_code as shopCode ,if(it.title = iu.title , '' , iu.title ) as title ,if(it.price1 = iu.price1 , '' ,iu.price1 ) as price1 ,if(it.price2 = iu.price2 , '' ,iu.price2 ) as price2 ,if(it.optionText = iu.optionText , '' ,iu.optionText ) as optionText ,if(it.thumbnailLink = iu.thumbnailLink , '' ,iu.thumbnailLink ) as thumbnailLink ,if(it.detailLink = iu.detailLink , '' ,iu.detailLink ) as detailLink FROM alpero.item it INNER JOIN alpero.item_update iu ON it.item_code = iu.item_code WHERE it.title <> iu.title OR it.price1 <> iu.price1 OR it.price2 <> iu.price2 OR it.optionText <> iu.optionText OR it.thumbnailLink <> iu.thumbnailLink OR it.detailLink <> iu.detailLink
